title: 21 Savage, Big Bank & DJ Scream - 4L
itunes:title: 21 Savage, Big Bank & DJ Scream - 4L
description:
21 Savage talks to the BIG FACTS crew about his immigration case, financial literacy, Savage Mode 2, police brutality and more. Also find out 21's top favorite R&B artist of all time on this new episode of BIG FACTS!
